privacy_page.page_title: Privacy Protocol | The Sins of the Fathers
privacy_page.intro: Welcome to the The Sins of the Fathers digital platform ("The Fortress"). We value the privacy of our operatives and readers. This document outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data.
privacy_page.sec1_desc: We collect information to provide a better experience and to manage your access to The Fortress.
privacy_page.sec1_li1: Identity Data: When you sign up via Google or Email (Firebase Auth), we store your email address, display name, and profile picture URL.
privacy_page.sec1_li2: Operational Data: We track your interaction with the timeline, factions, and lore pages to improve the narrative experience (via Google Analytics).
privacy_page.sec1_li3: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and device information are automatically logged for security and diagnostic purposes.
privacy_page.sec2_desc: Your data is used solely for the following purposes:
privacy_page.sec2_li1: To authenticate your identity and secure your account.
privacy_page.sec2_li2: To personalize your dossier (profile page) and save your allegiance (faction choice).
privacy_page.sec2_li3: To analyze system performance and user engagement.
privacy_page.sec2_li4: We do not sell your personal data to third-party brokers.
privacy_page.sec3_desc: We utilize trusted third-party services to operate this infrastructure:
privacy_page.sec3_li1: Firebase (Google): For authentication, database, and hosting services.
privacy_page.sec3_li3: Shopier / Gumroad: For processing external purchases. Note: We do not store your credit card information on our servers; payment processing happens on their secure platforms.
privacy_page.sec4_desc: You have the right to disappear. You can delete your account ("Burn Identity") at any time through your Profile page. Upon deletion, your personal identifier in our primary database is removed. Some anonymous logs may remain for system integrity.
privacy_page.sec5_desc: We use cookies to maintain your session and preferences. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but some terminal functions may become unavailable.
privacy_page.sec6_desc: For any inquiries regarding this protocol, please contact the architect at:
